cooling.title: RECS 2015 - Tables HC6.1 and HC7.1
cooling.fraction_derivation: Cooling multiple of 54.2% was determined as a proportion of total cooled homes where heating is done using natural gas from RECS 2015 microdata. Total cooled homes in the sample was found to be 103,100,000, and then filtered for square footage where natural gas is used for heating 55,900,000.

_description: Highest efficiency residential air source HP in 2017
